message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $15,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13,000.
Alice, thanks for countering. While $13,000 is closer, I'm aiming for something more budget-friendly. How about $11,000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $12,500.
